sub_title: Project Manager and Coordinator, Social Entrepreneur and Philanthropist
summary:
I am a results oriented Program Coordinator and Manager, with a successful track record including project monitoring and evaluation. I am highly motivated and have implemented projects and programs with exceedingly exceptional results and impacts.  I also have  great resource mobilisation and fundraising skills including building networks and partnerships, having represented my organisations in several high level meetings including at EU,  UN and Government levels. 

My Passion and objective is to contribute to efforts to build livelihoods and improve the well being of vulnerable groups and communities, specifically women, children and the youth. I am therefore continuously engaged in global and local discourses and initiatives that support alternative people centered  policy and sustainable development strategies including entrepreneurship development, respect for human rights. democracy and good governance.

As a result I have successfuly built and implemented initiatives that have influenced policy,  and advocated for people centered policies and parliamentary budgetary allocations which have helped improve access to quality heath care, support food scurity and climate chnage initiativesThese are critical factors in sustainable social economic political development and poverty eradication processes.

Having coordinated and managed regional and intersectoral programs programs and projects in diverse sectors and in different regions including Africa, Europe, Asia, the Pacific, and South Americas. I have managed intersectoral and cross regional programmes, .  to improve the livelihoods and welfare of vulnerable communities., hence also providing technical support and capacity building to institutions, including parliaments and parliamentarians for an in-depth understanding of their mandates, which includes policy development, legislative action, and oversight. 



I am a team player, adaptable with an ability and experience to smoothly navigate and adapt to constant evolving work  environments, also within with diverse cross cultural teams. I am  also very resourceful and with an eye for details and able to trouble shoot, generate and develop creative solutions to respond to challenges with maximum efficiency.  I am structured and strategic, yet flexible when needed,  a philanthropist and also a passionate social entrepreneur. I believe that stimulating a thriving people centered private sector is one of the key strategies towards sustainable development and poverty eradication.

company.name: Association of European Parliamentarians with Africa

profile_positions.location: Amsterdam Area, Netherlands and Nairobi, Kenya
profile_positions.company: Association of European Parliamentarians with Africa
profile_positions.description:
Program manager for the program “Fostering the values of democracy in the Great Lakes Region' including monitoring and evaluation  Organised and conducted regional and national capacity building trainings for Parliamentary Members in the Great Lakes Region to improve parliamentary policy development, legislative action and oversight in four key areas: the ground rules of parliamentary democracy, poverty reduction policy and strategies, private sector development, HIV AIDS and climate change

Keeping Africa high on the political and policy agenda in Europe through facilitating interaction, knowledge, expertise and skills exchange between parliamentarians in Europe and in Africa.
profile_positions.title: Programme Coordinator Fostering the Values of Democracy in The Great Lakes Region

profile_positions.description:
Liaised, built and strengthened networking with European Union and other EU institutions with The Salvation Army International and represented The Salvation Army in EU meetings in Brussels. 

Fundraising project management, and conducted monitoring and evaluation visits to ensure that projects are implementation within donor agreed guidelines and policies

Provided technical support to international community development project officers in the field
profile_positions.title: The European Union Community Development and Humanitarian Relief Project Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
•	Coordinated the Emergency Relief and Disaster Mitigation (ERDM) program of World Vision Taiwan and developed the World Vision Taiwan ERDM Policy strategy
•	Liaised and represented World Vision Taiwan in local and international consultations and meetings  liased with  Taiwan Government Overseas Development Agency for fundraising purposes
•	Reviewed proposals, recommended and made budgetary allocations of up to $ 3.000.000 to World Vision supported projects in Asia, Africa, Eastern Europe, and Latin America and updated the World Vision International Financial data base
•	Provided Program Management technical support to World Vision field projects and carried out field visits to monitor the World Vision Taiwan supported projects
•	Built staff capacity in project management, monitoring and evaluation and ERDM 
•	Contributed to WVI Emergency Relief and Reconstruction policy as a member of the World Vision International Global Humanitarian Relief and Disaster management Rapid Response Team and participated in trainings at World Vision International headquarters in Pomona California and Regional office in Bangkok
profile_positions.title: Program Officer
